revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=EnGenius |model=EAP900 |revision= |upc= |ean= |asin= |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=09/25/2013 |manuf_country=Taiwan |manuf=Senao |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=access point |fcc_id=A8J-EAP900 |ic_id=10103A-EAP900 |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=2.0 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_inner= |pwr_barrel_outer= |pwr_barrel_len= |pwr_vac= |pwr_ac_hz= |pwr_pol= |pwr_poe=af |cpu1_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |cpu1_model=QCA9558 |cpu1_cspeed= |cpu2_brand= |cpu2_model= |cpu2_cspeed= |fla1= |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model= |fla1_num= |fla2= |fla2_brand= |fla2_model= |fla2_num= |ram1=128 MiB |ram1_brand=Nanya |ram1_model=NT5TU32M16DG-AC |ram1_num=2 |ram2= |ram2_brand= |ram2_model= |ram2_num= |expansion_if_types= |expansion_pcmcia_num= |expansion_expresscard_num= |expansion_minipci_num= |expansion_minipcie_num= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module= |wi1_module_if= |wi1_chip1_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |wi1_chip1_model=QCA9558 |wi1_chip2_brand= |wi1_chip2_model= |wi1_chip3_brand= |wi1_chip3_model= |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |wi1_txchains=3 |wi1_rxchains=3 |wi1_sstreams=3 |wi2_module=EnGenius EMP5608H |wi2_module_if=Mini PCIe (oversized) |wi2_chip1_brand=Atheros |wi2_chip1_model=AR9580 |wi2_chip2_brand= |wi2_chip2_model= |wi2_chip3_brand= |wi2_chip3_model= |wi2_802dot11_protocols=an |wi2_ant_conn=U.FL |wi2_txchains=3 |wi2_rxchains=3 |wi2_sstreams=3 |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip1_brand= |eth_chip1_model= |eth_chip2_brand=Atheros |eth_chip2_model=AR8035-A |eth_chip3_brand= |eth_chip3_model= |sw_cpu= |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=1 |wan_ports= |flags= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=abgn |default_ssid=EnGeniusXXXXXX-2.4G, EnGeniusXXXXXX-5G |default_ssid_regex=^EnGenius[A-F0-9]{6}-2.4G$,,, ^EnGenius[A-F0-9]{6}-5G$ |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=admin |oui=88:DC:96 |oui_eth=88:DC:96 }}''Dual Band N900 Indoor Access Point''
Per the FCC photos... *"EAP900-0.30 LFP" is silkscreened on the main board. **The 2G radio is using three [http://www.skyworksinc.com/uploads/documents/SE2576L_DS.pdf '''Skyworks''' ('''SiGe''') SE2576L / 2576L 2.4GHz PAMs]. *"EMP5608H" and "0.20 LFP" is silkscreened on the 5G wireless module. **The 5G module is using three [http://www.skyworksinc.com/Product.aspx?ProductID=969 '''Skyworks''' ('''SiGe''') SE5003L / 5003L 5GHz PAMs] *This device appears to be using QCA9558-AT4A. *The power adapter shown in a '''Powertron Electronics Corp.''' PA1024-2HUB / PA1024-120HUB200 (100-240VAC ~ 50-60Hz, 0.6A -> 12VDC, 2.0A - 24W max.).
An additional model of EAP900H (noted as a '''high-power''' model) is referenced in the FCC docs. :The FCC docs note the tested model as EAP900. The devices are stated to be electrically identical and differing only in name for marketing purpose (hmm..).
Default settings are per the FCC manual. :Default SSID patterns are shown as '''EnGeniusXXXXXX-2.4G''' and '''EnGeniusXXXXXX-5G'''. This is presumed to be correct. :The manual shows 88:DC:96 OUIs in use. Again, it's presumed to be in use.
